metadata.name: El Viajero #1/1
metadata.description:
El Viajero (The Traveler) is a piece about my journey and personal growth as a man, father, and Artist.
This vision of a marvelous thing on the horizon may vary for you. Still, for me, it's self-acceptance, maybe even self-love, it sounds stupid, but I'm tired of listening to the voice in my head that only speaks less of me, that voice that won't even let me dream freely, the voice that's bullying me, my image, my thoughts, so it's a hard fight for me, but you know what? I am doing it. I made the first steps into this journey, this surreal world. The steps may be heavy and the way long and unknown, but it is my journey, and this is how I envision it.
With absolute love, Kavimaz.
